title: Drawing, Design for a Storefront with Art Deco-style Marquee, ca. 1925
title_raw: Design for a Storefront with Art Deco-style Marquee
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on off white paper, with ruled pen and gold ink border, mounted on gray paperboard
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on drawing, lower right:  Kilemnik y Cia arqos[os is underlined] [Kilemnik and Sons Architects] ; on mount, lower right:  217 [encircled] / K
description: Elaborate, wide facade with main,central entrance flanked by double doors.  Main opening has two large vitrines placed in v-shape at its center.  Over the central entrance and side doors is a straight marquee, the underside of which is decorated with overlapping semi-circles.  Three pedestrians sketched at left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for a Storefront with Art Deco-style Marquee, ca. 1925. Graphite, brush and white gouache on off white paper, with ruled pen and gold ink border, mounted on gray paperboard. 
Gift of Maureen Cogan. 1999-39-26
